overview: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be someone else? To completely take over their life? Susan (Stephanie Swift) is thrust into this strange situation when her friend offers to give her a make over after her husband dumps her. The transformation is amazing and her resemblance to the porn star Stephanie Swift is undeniable. While shy and timid as Susan, she soon breaks free of her former traits and soon becomes convinced that she is the Real Swift...
tagline: A case of mistaken identity: what could go wrong?
title: Real Swift
